definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Guoyang county in Bozhou 亳州[Bo2 zhou1], Anhui
Guoyang county in Bozhou 亳州[Bo2 zhou1], Anhui
dimple/variant of 酒窩|酒窝[jiu3 wo1]

sentences.english: The diabatic heating decreased when the vortex moving away from the plateau.
sentences.chinese: 当低涡远离高原后，非绝热加热减弱。

sentences.english: Turbulent coherent structures in the outer region of TBL are mainly lateral vortices.
sentences.chinese: 湍流边界层外区的相干结构主要表现为大尺度横向涡。

sentences.english: The formation and development of these horseshoe vortices were studied and compared.
sentences.chinese: 对这四种马蹄形涡的形成及发展进行了研究和比较。

sentences.english: Eddy-current separation experiments have proven its correctness of the model.
sentences.chinese: 涡电流分离条件实验证明了数学模型的正确性。

sentences.english: The development of junction vortex and wake of sail along the body are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对接合部涡与围壳尾流沿艇体的发展进行了分析。

sentences.english: Additionally there is particular analysis on the generation of vortex along span.
sentences.chinese: 同时对拟序结构中展向涡结构的生成进行详细分析。

sentences.english: The center of southwest low jet currently lay in the southeast quadrant of southwest vortex.
sentences.chinese: 西南风低空急流中心一般位于西南涡的东南象限。

sentences.english: Tip vortex goes downstream outward along the span direction, and the induced drag of the wing decreases.
sentences.chinese: 翼尖涡沿着展向方向向外移动，机翼诱导阻力减小。

sentences.english: As soon as the spoiler oscillates, induced vortices with definite frequencies appear downstream.
sentences.chinese: 就诱导出有固定频率的分离涡。

sentences.english: The process for the formation of the streamwise vortex in a transitional boundary layer is described.
sentences.chinese: 给出了转捩边界层中流向涡产生的物理过程。

sentences.english: For the strongly unsteady characteristic of the flow field of flapping-wing, the traditional vortex lattice method is not more effective.
sentences.chinese: 对扑翼的非定常流场，传统的定常涡格法已不再适用。

sentences.english: In this paper the motion of a straight vortex line in a water tunnel, which has a square cross section, is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了正方形截面水筒中直线涡的运动。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of acute ocular hypertension of rabbits induced by cauterizing vortex veins.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨涡静脉烧灼法诱发兔急性高眼压的效果。

sentences.english: They're those spinning vortexes of energy associated with places along the spine.
sentences.chinese: 他们的旋转涡与能源相关的地方沿脊椎。

sentences.english: In this paper the motion of a straight vortex line in a water tunnel having a square cross section is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了正方形截面水筒中直线涡的运动。

sentences.english: The lower frequency is associated with decrease of vortex current.
sentences.chinese: 频率太低，涡漩电流减小，同样导致搅拌力下降。

definition: surname Ying/river in Henan and Anhui
grain husk/tip of sth short and slender
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
"blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/irresolute
